content.question: Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Describe the trend in judicial independence in the United Kingdom between 1990 and 2019. Explain a possible reason for this trend. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about democratic consolidation in the United Kingdom between 1990 and 2019. (c) Explain why judicial independence in the United Kingdom differs from judicial independence in Russia.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Describe the trend in judicial independence in the United Kingdom between 1990 and 2019. Explain a possible reason for this trend. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about democratic consolidation in the United Kingdom between 1990 and 2019. (c) Explain why judicial independence in the United Kingdom differs from judicial independence in Russia.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
